texts.text: Access to all the groups you are allowed to use
Create and edit events and be organized
Create and edit rich text documents
Navigate through Internet and save your bookmarks
Public directory to share files with all the system users
Read and leave messages to all the system users
Save quick notes and edit text and source files
See which processes are running in your session and kill them
Send and receive e-mails with your usual POP3 mail accounts
Send private messages with attachments to the other eyeOS users
Send private messages with attachments to the system users
Stay tuned to the latest news from your favorite blogs
Stay tuned to the latest news from your favorite sources
Upload, manage and work with your files in eyeOS
Work with any FTP Server in the world
